name: Snowman's Escape from Meltdown
description:
The game has been created in Unity, using c# language for the script. In this gameplay, the player needs to save the snowman from the falling meteorites. Two-button are used to play the game (A) to move left and (D) to move right. If meteorite hits the snowman, then the game is over.

Alternatively, the player can use the "Right Arrow" and the "Left Arrow" keys as movement controls as well. 

Requirements: Intel i3 processor 

2GB RAM or above 

Nvidia GT710 or APU 

Windows 10 or above
